$comment: Text objects with a transcription (which is only supported for type 'object').

object.text: Hello, this is Mike. How may I help you

transcription.text: Hello, this is Mike. How may I help you

object.text: , Mike? Um, my name is Paul. Um, I'm your customer. And, uh, frankly, um, I'm getting quite angry

transcription.text: , Mike? Um, my name is Paul. Um, I'm your customer. And, uh, frankly, um, I'm getting quite angry
